# semantic-pull-request

[`LICENSE`](./LICENSE) | [`LICENSES`](./LICENSES)

A wrapper for `amannn/action-semantic-pull-request` that simplifies the configuration and usage of-Commit validation in GitHub Pull-Requests.

## References

- [`amannn`](amannn) / [`action-semantic-pull-request`](amannn/action-semantic-pull-request)
